title: How To Find Us
description: Directions and location information for Lamb Cottage Caravan Park

hero.title: How To Find Us
hero.subtitle: Easy directions to Lamb Cottage Caravan Park in the heart of Cheshire

steps: Take the M56 westbound towards Chester
Exit at Junction 12 for the A557 towards Runcorn
Follow signs for Vale Royal and local directions
Look for Lamb Cottage Caravan Park signs
Take the M62 eastbound, then M56 towards Chester
Exit at Junction 12 for the A557
Follow local signs to Vale Royal area
Continue to Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
Head north on the A556 towards Northwich
Follow signs for Whitegate and Vale Royal
Lamb Cottage Caravan Park will be on your right

tips: Look out for our distinctive entrance sign
The park is well signposted from main roads
If you get lost, call us on 01606 882302
